title: Bimetallic and plasmonic Ag and Cu integrated TiO2 thin films for enhanced solar hydrogen production in direct sunlight
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00056K, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sunesh S. Mani, Sivaraj Rajendran, Pushkaran S. Arun, Aparna Vijaykumar, Thomas Mathew, Chinnakonda S. Gopinath
Plasmonic metal nanoparticle integrated mesoporous TiO2 nanocomposites (Ag/TiO2, Cu/TiO2 and Ag–Cu/TiO2), prepared by a simple chemical reduction method, have been demonstrated to show superior activity in thin-film form for solar H2 generation.
